ref.mixed-citation: Shi C, Wang C, Wang H, Yang C, Cai F, Zeng F, et al. The potential of low molecular weight heparin to mitigate cytokine storm in severe covid-19 patients: a retrospective clinical study. medRxiv. Cold Spring Harbor Laboratory Press; 2020b;2020.03.28.20046144. This is a retrospective clinical study concerning the potential efficacy of anticoagulants to mitigate cytokine storm in COVID-19 patients.
